DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness electrostimulation treatment TENS use needle surface electrode combine exercise program fasciitis plantar . Half participant receive invasive electrostimulation ( TENS use needle ) exercise half receive electrostimulation placebo exercise .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Invasive Electrostimulation Combined With Exercise Program Plantar Fasciitis
DOC.detailed_description: There lot treatment fasciitis plantar . Exercises treatment recommend fasciitis plantar patient improve exercise . Dry needle recommend relieve pain heel . TENS use decrease pain fasciitis plantar . Investigators apply half participant treatment combine TENS + Dry needling ( invasive electrostimulation ) exercise half receive electrostimulation placebo ( TENS use surface electrodes non-therapeutic intensity ) + exercise .
DOC.criteria: Medical diagnosis plantar fasciitis Age equal superior 18 year old . VAS minimum 2 point int first step prolong decrease period . Having evolution month pain . Not received acupuncture dry needling treatment . Peripheral Neuropathies . Tarsus tunnel syndrome . Rheumatic disease . Contraindication dry needling : nickel allergy , fear needle , sky erosion . Clotting disorder thrombosis thrombophlebitis . Fractures , infection and/ tumor process . Have treat plantar fasciitis las 4 week . Previous surgery foot Pregnancy . Communication Disorders . Holders pacemaker electrostimulators .
